nodes.text: Hecaya's Might was an anarchist group that was captured by the Galactic Republic during the later years of the Cold War with the Sith Empire and imprisoned in the prison complex on the planet Belsavis. The remaining members, a trio of Humans, were incarcerated in the Minimum Security Section of the prison.

The Hecaya's Might group first appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic on the planet Belsavis, as a group of unidentified background non-player characters. However, the 2012 reference guide Star Wars: The Old Republic Encyclopedia featured them in a picture and a caption in the "A New Population of Scum and Villainy" infobox in the section on Belsavis.
